body:
As you all know, it is nearing the end of 2014, so to celebrate, you can ask me anything.

Ask Away :D
body_tagged:
As you all know, it is nearing the end of 2014, so to celebrate, you can ask me anything.

Ask Away :D
title: End of year! AMA

replies.body:
Do not you believe that there is much conmotion for the new year staff applications oppening?
In your opinion, who should be the next staff members?
replies.body_tagged:
Do not you believe that there is much conmotion for the new year staff applications oppening?
In your opinion, who should be the next staff members?

replies.body:
I don't know who should be the next staff member but I can guarantee you, I will be applying.
On topic, I guess... Whoever the senior staff think are responsible enough for the position.

replies.body:
1. My friends name is sheamus and I just thought of 4 random numbers off the top of my head and out came sheamus4414
2. Has to be blue
3.  Paulsoaresjr. He told me minecraft existed so I owe it all to Him.
4.  I don't have a favourite they are all op.
5. I guess so, yeah!
